steps.name: Then Enter the Ruleset "Ruleset" Rule Set Name textbox
And Enter the "Nothing" for the ruleset
And Select the "SO" from the dropdown
And Click on the Active toggle button to activate the column
And Check on Add to an Open Order
And Drag and drop the "Order Status" consolidation field
And Drag and drop the "Customer Code" field
And Enter Values in selected field

fullName: Verify the TMS functionality: The user should be able to create a ruleset successfully.
